Name: Car Constructor
About the game: Car Constructor will allow you to build, repair and paint your own car, then check it out on the race track! This game offers you a lot of tools for repairing and improving the car, a shop with a wide selection of spare parts, various types of paint and tuning, as well as a realistic mountain track and various types of road surface. Main Features Deep upgrade system of the car. You can replace almost any part Detailed ride physics Realistic graphics, big race track A real car enthusiast's garage!
Meta Title: Car Constructor: May 7, 2021, Sweet Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Car Constructor? Check out the release date (May 7, 2021), developer insights from Sweet Games, and a complete game summary.
